title: EP. - 451 - PAEDON BROWN FROM SISTER WIVES CELEBRITY BIG BROTHER FINALE
description:
Christine Brown’s son Paedon from Sister Wives on TLC talks about what it has been like having cameras film his family for 11 years, dynamics of growing up in a polygamous family, and the ground swell of support for his mom this season.

 

Podcast host Rob Cesternino helps Kate review the season finale of celebrity Big Brother on CBS.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
